title: Update failed.  Download the latest version.
content:
I am running 115.4.1 (64-bit). I noticed fairly recently that my main gmail account is not downloading the latest emails. I went to "Help", "About Thunderbird" and got the following error:

Update failed. Updates available at https://www.thunderbird.net/

I'm including a screen capture of the error.

Am I supposed to simply download the version at "https://www.thunderbird.net/" and then run that?

Thanks for any help.
creator: wkagc21m2iyf

title: can't get or send emails, panel on bottom of inbox page says "Checking mail server capabilities"
content: I am not receiving emails and when I try to send an email I get a warning "Sending of the message failed.Peerâ€™s Certificate issuer is not recognized.The configuration related to smtp.themessagingco.com.au must be corrected" I have made sure that the account information for incoming and outgoing mail is correct, but that is the limit of my understanding of what I can do. How can I correct this problem?

title: Thunderbird & CPU
content: Why is Thunderbird constantly using 20% of my CPU cycles when everything else I have open is together only using ~10%?
creator: geodave50

title: Badge count for starred search folder
content:
I've created a search folder to contain 'starred' emails but the folder doesn't show a badge count. Is this a setting somewhere or is it not supported?

title: Thunderbird - mails
content: I can receive mails - but not send mails An error occurred while sending mail: Outgoing server (SMTP) error. The server responded: Service unavailable. title: IP Address Temporarily Blacklisted
content: Cannot receive or send emails via Thunderbird account. Window popping up stating IP Address Temporarily Blacklisted. This happened once before (about 5 months ago) and it corrected itself after 10 days of being down. The last email received on laptop was May 22nd, 2024. Last email received via Droid phone was yesterday, June 8th, 2024. Have tried a reset of modem and router. Have had this email account with Thunderbird for over 10 years. After reading the Community comments, it's unclear whether it's a server issue, a Comcast issue, or a Thunderbird issue. Please help get my IP Address UN-Blacklisted... again.
creator: mjbolin

title: Thunderbird crashes when saving any attachment - OK until 2 days ago.
content:
If I try to save an attachment or add an attachment Thunderbird flashes up a window for one second then crashes. It only started happening a couple of days ago.

Tried attachment extractor add on but same issue. In "Settings > Save files to >Browse" also crashes. crashes also in troubleshoot mode. latest version of Thunderbird.

last crash report : Crash ID: 6c97ce14-2f2f-4f09-9424-6c7780240608
creator: britsportscar
